name: Gold Reef City
address: Northern Parkway & Data Crescent, Ormonde, Johannesburg
description: Gold Reef City is a popular amusement park in Johannesburg with thrilling rides, historical gold mine tours, and entertainment for all ages.

name: Apartheid Museum
address: Northern Park Way and Gold Reef Rd, Johannesburg
description: The Apartheid Museum illustrates the rise and fall of apartheid through film, text, audio and live accounts of apartheid history.

name: Constitution Hill
description: A living museum that tells the story of South Africa's journey to democracy through exhibitions and guided tours of the Old Fort prison complex.

name: Walter Sisulu Botanical Gardens
description: Beautiful botanical gardens featuring indigenous plants, walking trails, and the spectacular Witpoortjie Waterfall.

name: Neighbourgoods Market
description: A vibrant Saturday market offering artisanal foods, crafts, live music and a great atmosphere in the heart of Braamfontein.

name: Lion & Safari Park
description: Experience close encounters with lions, cheetahs, wild dogs and other African wildlife just outside Johannesburg.

name: Soweto Towers
description: Iconic former cooling towers now used for bungee jumping and featuring vibrant murals depicting South African history.

name: Montecasino Bird Gardens
description: Beautiful gardens housing hundreds of exotic bird species, reptiles and small mammals with daily flying shows.
